schema.title: Response List Tasks Today Api V1 Tasks Today Get

get.description: List tasks for the current Telegram user.

post.description: Create a new task for the current user.
Mark the given task as done.

get.description: List calendar events for the current user.

post.description: Create a calendar event for the current user.

get.description: Return items within the provided time range.

schema.title: Response List Notes Api V1 Notes Get

post.description: Create a note for the current user.

delete.description: Delete a note owned by the current user.

post.description: Start a new timer for the current user.
Stop the timer for the given entry if owned by user.

get.description: List time entries for the current user.

schema.title: Response Api Time Status Api V1 Time Get
Response Api Time Running Api V1 Time Running Get

post.description: Resume work on a task by starting a new running entry for it.

Response List Resources Api V1 Resources Get
Response List Inbox Notes Api V1 Inbox Notes Get

post.description:
Restart systemd unit for 'web' or 'bot' (requires sudoers setup).

Returns JSON with result. The service user must have passwordless sudo for
the corresponding units, e.g. in /etc/sudoers.d/intData:
    www-data ALL=NOPASSWD: /bin/systemctl restart intdata-web, /bin/systemctl restart intdata-bot
